text: Ivy, we're not friends. We are not going on some adventure. When the ritual is over, you will go home to a family, and I will be counting the bodies of the dead. So let's just stay focused on the task at hand.

segments.text: Ivy, we're not friends. We are not going on some adventure.
When the ritual is over, you will go home to a family, and I will be counting the bodies of the dead.
So let's just stay focused on the task at hand.
